name: ENVIRONMENTAL
description: Environmental photography is most often used as a tool to raise awareness and educate humans on the impact they cause on the environment.

name: NATURE
description: Nature photography covers shooting flora and fauna. This means plants, flowers, and animals, photographed in their immediate environments.
review: Love it! I have been looking for these for months.

name: PORTRAITS
description: Portrait photography is an excellent skill to cultivate for anyone with a camera.
review: It's beautiful ! Highly recommend it! defiantly will shop for a new shade again !

name: MOTION
description: Motion can give an image drive, energy, and a sense of added dimension.
review: Its colors are excellent and it is worth trusting

name: SHADOWS & LIGHT
description: That sunset and sunrise on a safari
review: loved them! and amazing seller and great customer support !

name: FIRE & ICE
description: Place objects in a lunchbox, fill with water, pop it in a freezer and once frozen, put the frozen block in front of lens.
review: Love the look!! Good quality. Looks great on.
